Muskoin

About Muskoin

The only person who can mint a Muskoin is Elon Musk.

A Muskoin is an Ethereum-based ERC-721 non-fungible token (NFT) containing a meme signed by Elon Musk.

If you send Elon a meme and he likes it, he might mint you a Muskoin.

We have already built the technical infrastructure to make this a reality. Help us get Elon on board by amplifying our Twitter!

How to earn Muskoin

Step 0

Make a meme for Elon and post it somewhere, like Twitter or Imgur.

Step 1

Visit muskoin.app/#/meme.

Step 2

Input your meme URL and your Ethereum wallet address.

Step 3

Tweet at Elon (e.g. on Twitter) and get him to click the link.

How Elon mints coins

Step 0 (only happens once)

We need Elon to DM or tweet his public Ethereum address to us (just a Metamask wallet address) and we will then grant him the MINTER_ROLE in the Mainnet Muskoin ERC721 contract.

Step 1

He then clicks the convenience link provided by a meme-maker. It will auto-fill the fields on this page: muskoin.app/#/mint.

Step 2

Click the button that says “To the Moon!” (Metamask must be connected to the browser being used).

Leaderboard

Visit muskoin.app/#/memelords to see who owns Muskoins!

When Elon mints a coin, you will be able to see it in this table.

Contributing

We built this project for fun and love of sweet memes. We welcome proposed improvements to the source code. If you’d like to contribute, you can open a PR to our Github repository.
